text.text_translated:
Some dogs live in groups. They have learned that people give food more to small and nice-looking dogs. So the group sends these dogs to ask for food many times for the whole pack.

Some dogs can even use the city's metro system. They travel to different parts of the area they control. Scientists are not sure how the dogs know when to leave the train.

One idea is that the dogs have a great sense of smell. They remember the smells of their favourite places. Another idea is that they hear the station names and remember them.

Now, it is normal for people on the metro to see the dogs. So the local people do not really notice them.

best_attempt.text_translated:
Some dogs live in groups. They have learned that people give more food to small and nice-looking dogs. So the group sends these dogs to ask for food for the whole pack.

Some dogs can even use the city's metro system. They travel to different parts of their territory. Scientists are not sure how the dogs know when to leave the train.

One idea is that the dogs can smell very well. They remember the smells of their favourite places. Another idea is that they hear the station names and remember them.

Now, it is normal for people on the metro to see the dogs. So the local people do not really notice them.
